en_text: Why...

jp_text: {\blur2}僕が気持ちいいことして

google_translated: How about it if it is

google_translated: I have something I want to ask her

en_text: Get changed and come to the living room.

en_text: Can you tell me what you know about them?
jp_text: {\blur2}彼らについて　分かることを話して頂けますか

en_text: What I know about them?
jp_text: {\blur2}私のことをイブって呼んでいました

jp_text: {\blur2}あ　あの　なぜかはよく分からないんですけど
google_translated: I do not know why not

en_text: but they kept calling me "Eve."
jp_text: {\blur2}「イブ」

en_text: Did they mention anything about "Adam"?
jp_text: {\blur2}彼らは「アダム」について　何か言ってませんでしたか

en_text: As the one who possesses the blood of Eve,
jp_text: {\blur2}イブの血を持つお前ならば　間違えることなく　見つけ出すはずだ
google_translated: If you have blood of  Eve, you should find it without mistake

en_text: Just as I thought.
jp_text: {\blur2}当然です　考えれば想像はつきます
google_translated: Naturally I imagine if you think

en_text: You even know they were once humans?
jp_text: {\blur2}あの　レイジさん　何か知ってるんですか

en_text: Did you do nothing but let them
jp_text: {\blur2}貴女は向こうで一体何をしていたんですか
google_translated: What did you do on the other side?

en_text: Come to think of it,
jp_text: {\blur2}今の話　聞いていましたよね
google_translated: I was listening to the story

en_text: they said they needed my blood for some plan.

google_translated: Sometimes I need my blood to plan something

en_text: You heard all that, right, Shu?
jp_text: {\blur2}そういうことですか

en_text: Have you heard anything from Father?

google_translated: Do you not hear something from the father

en_text: But he's probably planning something.
jp_text: {\blur2}けど何か企んではいるんじゃないの

en_text: Um, Reiji-san...
jp_text: {\blur2}あの　レイジさん

en_text: Why did all the Mukami \Nbrothers call me "Eve"?
jp_text: {\blur2}どうして無神のみんなは　私をイブって呼ぶんでしょうか
google_translated: Why is everyone in the inconvenient call me me?

en_text: Kanato-kun.
jp_text: {\blur2}カナトくん

en_text: I won't forgive you even if \Nyou cry and beg for it.
jp_text: {\blur2}泣いて謝ったって　許してなんてあげません
google_translated: I'm sorry I forgive you for crying

en_text: We don't have much time \Nuntil the next full moon.

google_translated: It is not a monthly erosion

en_text: in both the human and demon worlds.
jp_text: {\blur2}魔界と人間界に同時に訪れる　特別な月蝕
google_translated: Special monthly eclipse to visit the demon and human world simultaneously

en_text: Our vampire powers will decrease tremendously.

jp_text: {\blur2}何事もなければいいのですが
google_translated: I have to do what part

google_translated: I wonder why I can be called

en_text: What my blood has to do with all this,
jp_text: {\blur2}私の血がどう関係しているのか

en_text: and who this "Him" the Mukami \Nbrothers were talking about is...

google_translated: Who is that everyone saying that everyone said that

google_translated: I do not need to know about it

en_text: In the first place, I doubt they'll \Nbe able to carry out their plan.
jp_text: {\blur2}そもそも　彼らの計画はうまく行くとは思えませんしね
google_translated: I can not think that their plans go well in the first place

en_text: What do you mean?
jp_text: {\blur2}どういうことですか

en_text: Reiji-san!

en_text: You really are a fool.

en_text: However, it is true that \Nyour blood is special.
jp_text: {\blur2}ただ　貴女の血が特別なのは事実です
google_translated: Just that your blood is special

en_text: The sweet scent drives everyone insane...
jp_text: {\blur2}甘美な香りで　皆を狂わせる

en_text: The idea of them stealing this blood
jp_text: {\blur2}この血を彼らに奪われるの
